data.title: Tara Pollock
data.text:
"I had such a great experience using Slater Grant, and specifically Julia Alley as my accident attorney. The communication was constant and I felt we got a great result. There was kindness and compassion expressed by everybody at the firm, from the smallest details such as a birthday card, to ensure a terrible experience was..." — Tara M.

"Slater/Grant recently finalized a lawsuit for me that resulted in a very good settlement. From the first time I contacted them regarding my claim their team started investigating everything about it and were extremely thorough. They just kept at it and never dropped the ball. I was very pleased and thankful for their attentiveness. This..." — R.R.

"The Slater | Grant Law Firm is a very professional organization. I dealt with Attorney Javan Grant and his team on my personal injury case. The communication was great, and the door was always open for me to call and ask questions at anytime. Attorney Grant and his team kept me informed, through conference calls..." — Eddie C.

"Working with Javan Grant and his team was a pleasure. They truly made a difficult situation easy, and they were able get me much more than what the insurance company originally offered. Thank you, Slater | Grant, much appreciated." — Kathrina W.

"Javan and his team worked hard on our case. He was very professional and available to talk with us whenever we had questions or concerns. He explained everything in a way we could understand and was very transparent. We are pleased with their service and the outcome of our case. Highly recommend this firm." — Lindsey B.

"My sincere thanks to the Javan Grant, Scott Slater and their team! I am extremely grateful to the attorneys and to the entire Slater | Grant team for the professionalism and respect shown to me throughout duration of our relationship. Over and over again I was impressed and pleased with their intelligence, their thorough understanding..." — Carole C.

"My family and I were unfortunately involved in an accident early in 2021, but were fortunate enough to have been referred to Slater | Grant for our representation. The fact of the matter is that auto accidents are already a traumatic experience, dealing with insurance companies adds to the misery, and the last thing you..." — Jay T.

"I cannot say enough good things about this company and the wonderful people that work here. They are honest, caring professional and most importantly stay in contact with everyone that is involved in each case. I would recommend anyone who has been in an accident to at least take advantage of the complimentary consultation to..." — Theodore D.

"Slater | Grant are the best trial lawyers in all the Tampa Bay area. Scott Slater certainly treats you like family by making your case their number one priority. Personally, I feel his best attribute is being smarter than the opponent. You want an attorney who is meticulous in the trial process, and absolutely no..." — Brian V.

"In 2014 my son Robert was tragically killed in a motorcycle accident. During Mr. Grant’s representation of my son on this case I found his compassion and care of both myself and my family outstanding. His representation of my son was without question the best I could have ever asked for. During my..." — Tina B.

"Javan and team were wonderful to work with on my injury case. He was fantastic at explaining subjects I was unsure about which allowed me to feel confident in making decisions when it came time. Fantastic communication, and great execution in the lawsuit. Extremely happy with my experience. I definitely recommend if you are in..." — Brodey L.

"Javan Grant was my lawyer for a personal injury case and he worked tirelessly to settle the case without going to trial. He was always available to take my phone calls and was very knowledgeable about all aspects of my case. I highly recommend using Slater Grant!" — Laura M.

"I was recently in an automobile accident where the other driver was cited as being at fault. The accident caused some fairly substantial property damage, but I was only physically sore and emotionally shaken up. Knowing that injuries from car accidents sometimes don’t present immediately, I wanted to speak to an attorney to make sure..." — John Y.

"It was great working with these attorneys. They helped me reach an equitable settlement in a multi-person auto accident. My questions and concerns were addressed without delay and they delivered the best outcome achievable. They had my back!" — Susan G.

"I asked Scott Slater to assist me in a business litigation matter less than one business day prior to a scheduled hearing. He was gracious enough to except my request on a limited engagement. His demeanor is both calm and professional. He is knowledgeable and wise beyond his years. He was able to get us..." — LL

"Javan including his staff were great. They were very diligent, always answered my questions in a timely manner, very thorough and explained all the steps in terms I understood. I would highly recommend this team to anyone. I can't begin to thank them enough." — Tanya W.

"Highly recommended. They took the time to discuss my options when no other attorneys' office would. I'd like to say that I'd be back, but let's hope I'm not." — Amy G.

"I've hired Scott Slater a few times over the years for his Business Law expertise. He has always been very thorough and available. He is very savvy in his craft and presents himself very professional and understands your needs. 5 Stars for this firm and I would definitely hire him again." — Jimmy Q.

"I have worked with Scott Slater on several contractual and litigation matters and his guidance and work product have always been first-rate. Scott took the time to listen and understand the issues facing my company (IRONMAN), thoughtfully provided guidance and did not gouge me with an unreasonable fee. I would recommend Scott and..." — Steve J.

"Provided a great consultation, and ensured all my questions were answered. Javan was kind, courteous, helpful, and took the time necessary to make me feel comfortable." — Crystal N.

"I have a tremendous amount of respect for Attorney Javan Grant and have relied on his sound counsel in both corporate and personal legal matters alike for many years. Most recently, Slater-Grant advised my company on complex trial preparation in an out of state employment matter. They are direct, diligent and bring a common sense..." — Woodlands Senior Living

"You are in good hands here. I am 2-0 ( undefeated ) with these guys. They handle a variety of cases and they act swiftly ! My highest recommendation." — Grant D.

"Spoke to Mr. Javan Grant in regards to a situation I found myself in pertaining to a vehicle accident & he was very helpful. In addition to being professional and courteous Javan was also genuinely interested in helping. It was nice to know that he was there to assist and wanted to help get a..." — Robert J.

"Since 2011 I have relied on Javan Grant's professional counsel. My grandfather always told me your accountant & lawyer should be your best friends. As a business owner now I understand what he was talking about. I am truly blessed to have found a lawyer that I trust & who is damn good at their..." — Jackie M.

"Javan Grant and Scott Slater have been very helpful in aiding our clients with their legal concerns. I am a Founder and Principal of a Wealth Management firm and my reputation is on the line when I send any referral to any other professional. Without any hesitation I would introduce my family, friends and..." — Eric L.

"Our company contacted Javan Grant regarding a business dispute. He was always very professional, explained the process very clearly to us and was prompt to answer emails or phone calls. Javan put us at ease during a potentially agonizing situation and turned a negative circumstance into a positive one. I would highly recommend Javan Grant." — Desiree G.
